page.title: 03HOSPITAL
page.content: Many years ago a hospital was built in Wingland near the River Nene.It was a special fever hospital for any sailors who were taken ill on the ships that sailed up the river.The idea was that if any of the men had a fever they could be taken of the ship and put into the fever hospital so that the disease would not spread to the other sailors or tothe people of Sutton Bridge. From what we can find out about the hospital it seems that it has only been used once. It was pulled down 2 years back.So that is why the road is called hospital road.
